nodes.text:
A baton, also called a stun baton or security baton, was a melee weapon utilized primarily by
law enforcement as a personnel defense and crowd control tool. It was carried by police officers and GU-series Guardian police droids of the Coruscant Security Force and of the Mandalorian Guard. Clone riot troopers of the Coruscant Guard were also armed with them for duty on Coruscant. Both stormtroopers and Imperial "Riot" Cadets wielded them during Governor Ubrik Adelhard's Iron Blockade of the Anoat sector. The First Order's riot control stormtroopers used the Z6 riot control baton, which could withstand a lightsaber's blows.
